habitatLoss.title: Habitat Loss
habitatLoss.description: The encroachment of human settlements and development projects contributes to the loss of the leopard's natural habitat. This threat leads to fragmented habitats, limiting the leopard's range.
points: Reduced territory for leopards, increased human-leopard conflicts.
Conservation Mechanisms: Protected area expansion, reforestation initiatives.

illegalWildlifeTrade.title: Illegal Wildlife Trade
illegalWildlifeTrade.description: The illegal wildlife trade poses a severe threat to leopards, with their skins and body parts sought after in the black market. Poaching activities jeopardize the leopard population.
points: Decline in leopard numbers, disruption of the ecosystem.
Conservation Mechanisms: Strengthening law enforcement, community engagement against poaching.
